comment: Very nice lady but very tough grader. English is my strong suit and I was unable to get an A on any essay. She does offer extra credit though.

Professor Rivera is awesome! She is very detailed in her grading and gives constructive feedback that helps you learn what you need to improve. She wants you to be successful and will do everything to help you do so. If you can, please take her! You will love her! I'm sad that I can't take anymore classes with her.

Professor Rivera is AMAZING!!! She is an excellent grader and really cares for her students. She is willing to meet with you to discuss your writing and is always willing to help! As long as you show up to class and put in effort, this class is an easy A. She was so amazing, that I signed up for her 1102 class! If you can get her, TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: Prof. Rivera is super laid back in her teaching style. She provides you with a lot of materials to do well in the class and what you do in this class is very applicable to other classes. If you need any help with writing outside of class she is suer accessible. Her memes in her lectures are legendary.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Rivera is an amazing professor and really cares about her students. Her grading and what she expects is very clear. She truly helped me throughout the class when I needed it and her memes are LIT.

Ms. Rivera cares about her students and will work with you to help you succeed in the class. She's an easy grader and she provides good feedback on essays. Ms. Rivera also tells interesting stories and holds entertaining discussions in class each day.
rating_tags: Participation matters--SO MANY PAPERS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof. Rivera is very easy going and wants you to pass. As long as you follow the rubric for each assignment its impossible not to get an A in the course. Homework is light and easy with few assignments due besides papers. Definitely would take if you have the chance.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
